AI Description: GObject Introspection is a middleware layer between C libraries (using GObject) and language bindings. The goal is to make the C libraries accessible from scripting languages and other environments without the need for manual intervention.
Core Features: Automated Generation Of Language Bindings For C Libraries, Allows Scripting Languages & Other Environments To Access C Libraries Easily, Eliminates Manual Intervention In Creating Language Bindings, Supports Gobject-Based Libraries
